configurations.name: Generate Icons
configurations.command: dart ./tools/generate_icons_helper.dart && flutter pub global activate icon_generator && icon_generator --from=./assets/icons/svg --class-name=CustomIcons --out-font=./assets/fonts/CustomIcons.ttf --out-flutter=./lib/src/components/icons/custom_icons.dart --package=comento_design_system --naming-strategy=camel --normalize
